summary:
- Assisted and supported patient experience IT Teams for multiple large healthcare organizations, ensuring a successful patient experience for millions of patients. 
- Managed deployment and maintenance of web infrastructure for major COVID Vaccination sites.
- Led task force to ensure MyChart stability for COVID Testing and Vaccination sites across hundreds of organizations
- Found inefficient processes both internally and within our software, and developed solutions to vastly improve user efficiency.

- Developed prototyping and permanent die sets for manufacturing of stamped metal parts.
- Handled quotes and layout for laser cut parts, leading to development of hundreds of new products designed to meet specific customer needs.
- Worked on team to implement new company-wide ERP software for more efficient product management.

- Coordinated development of Inventory Management System to improve quality reporting and tracking, leading to improved response time for test failures
- Assisted in certifying over $700,000 of SIFCO product prior to shipment
- Documented and improved quality department's product review process to improve tracking and reduce storage times

- Provided Blackboardâ„¢ and hardware assistance to students and faculty to enable connectivity and facilitate more effective use of the site.
- Assisted in new Learning Management System deployment for over 10,000 faculty and students. 
- Developed automated tools to increase faculty productivity.
